ygData.subject: RE: [cantera] Using an adiabatic freely propagating flame solution as an initial guess
ygData.msgSnippet: Jeff, I am also trying to take a solution calculated by the adiabatic freely propagating flame demo in python, and use it as an initial guess to find the next
